DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study measure effect Health-At-Every-Size ( HAES ) approach global health status premenopausal overweight woman preoccupy weight unsuccessful previous weight loss attempt .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Health-At-Every-Size Approach Weight Management Premenopausal Overweight Women
DOC.detailed_description: Weight management critical issue develop country prevalence obesity increase . Poor long-term success observe current weight-control strategy stress relevance explore new weight management approach . One approach , refer Health-At-Every-Size ( HAES ) , new weight paradigm focus healthy lifestyle promote overall health benefit behavioral change relate dietary habit physical activity emphasize self-acceptance well-being , independently body weight status . Studies effect HAES approach show significant improvement metabolic psychological variable . To knowledge , study yet report short long-term impact HAES approach cluster variable ( psychological , morphological , metabolic , nutritional ) woman . The aim study measure effect HAES approach global health status premenopausal overweight woman preoccupy weight unsuccessful previous weight loss attempt . In parallel control trial , woman randomize one 3 treatment condition : HAES group , Social support group ( SS ) , Control group . Measurements take short term well long term ( 1 year post-intervention ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy premenopausal woman Quebec City metropolitan area Age : 30 50 year old Stable body weight ( +/ 2 kg ) least 2 month begin study Overweight obesity : Body mass index [ BMI ] 25 35 kg/m2 Preoccupation weight eat : showing overconcern shape weight , exhibit restriction food choice least 2 year , unsuccessful previous attempt lose weight ( least past 2 year ) Current weight correspond maximum weight reach adult lifetime Exclusion criterion : Women currently diet lose weight Taking oral contraceptive postmenopausal status Pregnant lactate woman Under treatment coronary heart disease , diabetes , dyslipidemia , hypertension , depression endocrine disorder ( exception stable thyroid disease ) Women present metabolic important psychological disorder ( drug alcohol abuse , bulimia , â€¦ ) Women already take part HealthAtEverySize ( HAES ) approach
